name: Dinner Tonight: Pea and Ginger Soup
description: Okay, this really couldn't be simpler. Toss everything into a pot, cook for fifteen minutes, blend, and serve. That's really it. Sure, it's not the best soup I've ever had, but works as a simple side or quick meal. It's...

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the chicken stock into a large pot along with the peas and ginger. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer. Cook for 15 minutes.
Blend the soup with an immersion blender, or in batches in a blender. Season with salt and pepper. Serve.
